name: Prison Break (itch) (cwru-eecs290)
description:
It's been ages since you've seen the outside world, and today's the day you've finally decided to make a break for it. The guards slipped up and left your cell open and now is your chance to escape. PRISON BREAK: stealthily hide behind walls and change outfits in this third-person shooter that combines puzzle elements and action combat. 

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Z - Equip Gun
  • X - Equip Knife
  • C - Drop Weapon
  • V - Drop Key
  • 1-3 - Switch Outfits
  • Space - Attack/Toggle Shooting
  • Mouse - Shoot

Developers (Team 20)

Dennis Lin, Kyle Thompson, Melo Zeng
